summary: THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A NOTICE FOR RECALL REMEDY 02V288000.  PRIOR TO RECEIVING NOTICE, CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE SERVICE DEALER REGARDING  THE FRAYING OF THE BATTERY CABLES.  ONCE THE RECALL NOTICE WAS RECEIVED, THE CONSUMER TOOK THE CAR BACK TO DEALER AND THEY TRIED TO FORCE THE CONSUMER TO FILE A WARRANTY CLAIM FOR REPAIR.    *JB
